name: ChartSeries
description: Represents a series in a chart.

properties.name: chartType
properties.description: Represents the chart type of a series.

properties.name: doughnutHoleSize
properties.description: Represents the doughnut hole size of a chart series.  Only valid on doughnut and doughnutExploded charts.

properties.name: xErrorBars
properties.description: Represents the error bar object for a chart series.

properties.name: yErrorBars
properties.description: Represents the error bar object for a chart series.

properties.name: dataLabels
properties.description: Represents a collection of all dataLabels in the series.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Represents the formatting of a chart series, which includes fill and line formatting.

properties.name: gapWidth
properties.description: Represents the gap width of a chart series.  Only valid on bar and column charts, as well as

properties.name: hasDataLabels
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the series has data labels or not.

properties.name: filtered
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the series is filtered or not. Not applicable for surface charts.

properties.name: markerSize
properties.description: Represents marker size of a chart series.

properties.name: markerStyle
properties.description: Represents marker style of a chart series.

properties.name: showShadow
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the series has a shadow or not.

properties.name: markerBackgroundColor
properties.description: Represents markers background color of a chart series.

properties.name: markerForegroundColor
properties.description: Represents markers foreground color of a chart series.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Represents the name of a series in a chart.

properties.name: plotOrder
properties.description: Represents the plot order of a chart series within the chart group.

properties.name: points
properties.description: Represents a collection of all points in the series.

properties.name: smooth
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the series is smooth or not. Only applicable to line and scatter charts.

properties.name: trendlines
properties.description: Represents a collection of trendlines in the series.

properties.name: axisGroup
properties.description: Returns or sets the group for the specified series. ReadWrite

properties.name: explosion
properties.description: Returns or sets the explosion value for a pie-chart or doughnut-chart slice. Returns 0 (zero) if there's no explosion (the tip of the slice is in the center of the pie). ReadWrite.

properties.name: firstSliceAngle
properties.description: Returns or sets the angle of the first pie-chart or doughnut-chart slice, in degrees (clockwise from vertical). Applies only to pie, 3-D pie, and doughnut charts. Can be a value from 0 through 360. ReadWrite

properties.name: invertIfNegative
properties.description: True┬áif Microsoft Excel inverts the pattern in the item when it corresponds to a negative number. ReadWrite.

properties.name: invertColor
properties.description: Returns or sets the fill color for negative data points in a series. ReadWrite.

properties.name: bubbleScale
properties.description: Returns or sets the scale factor for bubbles in the specified chart group. Can be an integer value from 0 (zero) to 300, corresponding to a percentage of the default size. Applies only to bubble charts. ReadWrite.

properties.name: gradientMaximumColor
properties.description: Returns or sets the Color for maximum value of a region map chart series. ReadWrite.

properties.name: gradientMaximumType
properties.description: Returns or sets the type for maximum value of a region map chart series. ReadWrite.

properties.name: gradientMaximumValue
properties.description: Returns or sets the maximum value of a region map chart series. ReadWrite.

properties.name: gradientMidpointColor
properties.description: Returns or sets the Color for midpoint value of a region map chart series. ReadWrite.

properties.name: gradientMidpointType
properties.description: Returns or sets the type for midpoint value of a region map chart series. ReadWrite.

properties.name: gradientMidpointValue
properties.description: Returns or sets the midpoint value of a region map chart series. ReadWrite.

properties.name: gradientMinimumColor
properties.description: Returns or sets the Color for minimum value of a region map chart series. ReadWrite.

properties.name: gradientMinimumType
properties.description: Returns or sets the type for minimum value of a region map chart series. ReadWrite.

properties.name: gradientMinimumValue
properties.description: Returns or sets the minimum value of a region map chart series. ReadWrite.

properties.name: gradientStyle
properties.description: Returns or sets series gradient style of a region map chart. ReadWrite.

properties.name: secondPlotSize
properties.description: Returns or sets the size of the secondary section of either a pie of pie chart or a bar of pie chart, as a percentage of the size of the primary pie. Can be a value from 5 to 200. ReadWrite.

properties.name: splitType
properties.description: Returns or sets the way the two sections of either a pie of pie chart or a bar of pie chart are split. ReadWrite.

properties.name: splitValue
properties.description: Returns or sets the threshold value separating the two sections of either a pie of pie chart or a bar of pie chart. ReadWrite.

properties.name: varyByCategories
properties.description: True┬áif Microsoft Excel assigns a different color or pattern to each data marker. The chart must contain only one series. ReadWrite.

properties.name: showLeaderLines
properties.description: True if Microsoft Excel show leaderlines for each datalabel in series. ReadWrite.

properties.name: overlap
properties.description: Specifies how bars and columns are positioned. Can be a value between ΓÇô 100 and 100. Applies only to 2-D bar and 2-D column charts. ReadWrite.

properties.name: parentLabelStrategy
properties.description: Returns or sets series parent label strategy area of a treemap chart. ReadWrite.

properties.name: showConnectorLines
properties.description: Returns or sets if connector lines show in a waterfall chart. ReadWrite.

properties.name: binOptions
properties.description: Encapsulates the bin options only for histogram chart and pareto chart.

properties.name: boxwhiskerOptions
properties.description: Encapsulates the options for the Box & Whisker chart.

properties.name: mapOptions
properties.description: Encapsulates the options for the Map chart.

methods.name: setXAxisValues
methods.description: Set values of X axis for a chart series. Only works for scatter charts.

parameters.name: sourceData
parameters.description: The Range object corresponding to the source data.

methods.name: setValues
methods.description: Set values for a chart series. For scatter chart, it means Y axis values.

parameters.name: sourceData
parameters.description: The Range object corresponding to the source data.

methods.name: setBubbleSizes
methods.description: Set bubble sizes for a chart series. Only works for bubble charts.

parameters.name: sourceData
parameters.description: The Range object corresponding to the source data.
